title: 如何把存档地图换到服务器里面？
author: paohuizhiwang

replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
1关服
2删除服务端world文件夹
3把单人存档名改成world 复制到服务端文件夹
4开服

replies.author: paohuizhiwang
replies.txt_content:
